itunes:title: Indie Publishers
title: Indie Publishers
description: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with agents extraordinaire, Carly Watters and CeCe Lyra, in their regular Books with Hooks segment, in which listeners send in their query letters and first pages to get advice on grabbing their dream agents' attention. After which, Bianca chats with Alexandria Brown, co-owner of indie publisher, Rising Action Publishing Co, about the pros and cons of  the various types of publishing, and why you might want to consider going with an indie publisher.
content:encoded: Author and host, Bianca Marais, chats with agents extraordinaire, Carly Watters and CeCe Lyra, in their regular Books with Hooks segment, in which listeners send in their query letters and first pages to get advice on grabbing their dream agents' attention. After which, Bianca chats with Alexandria Brown, co-owner of indie publisher, Rising Action Publishing Co, about the pros and cons of  the various types of publishing, and why you might want to consider going with an indie publisher.
itunes:author: Bianca Marais, Carly Watters, Cecilia Lyra and Alexandria Brown
itunes:keywords: Bianca Marais, Carly Watters, Cecilia Lyra, PS Literary Agency, Books with Hooks, Alexandria Brown, Rising Action Publishing Co, indie publishers, query letters, opening pages, critique, publishing advice, writing
